support.title: 1 die of your choice (Drake or Human)
support.descp: 1 die of your choice (Drake or Human)

updates.update_content:
Hello backers!
Last year, our dice campaign has been a great success (thanks!), we hope to be back soon on kickstarter because we have some new ideas. But before beginning this new project, we would like to know if you would have particular desires, improvements on the hit location dice. Feel free to share with us!

Some news: today we have sent parcels again; we are going to send the last parcels tomorrow and the day after tomorrow. We must have about 200 parcels left to send out.
Thank you for your patience, it's a big organization to have, especially when there are only two of us, but we're happy to do it :)
Okay, so... let's go back to tape, label and stamp the packages and we'll send you all that!
---

Hi,
We worked hard to finish the rewards. So we can start shipping from Wednesday 20th.
There are still some latecomers who have not yet completed the questionnaire and/or solved their payment problems: don't forget to do what is necessary;)

Thanks backers! We reached the goal in less than 24 hours. We are so glad! We hope it'll go on like this.
Please share with your friends and help us spread the word!
Best,
Elisabeth & Julien

comments.content: Thanks.
Got my dice in and both my players and I LOVE using them to add more flavour to everyone's crits! Especially mine since as a DM I roll an EVIL amount of 20s!

I am totally sorry, for some reason I never got the notice from kickstarter that my info didn't get sent to you back in december until I clicked back onto the page today... that is totally my bad for not checking in properly and earlier.
I wanted to see if any dice have been sent out to Atlantic Canada as of yet, I haven't received mine.

I forgot to leave a comment when I received these but just wanted to say that they are really awesome! We've already made use of them in my DnD group! They also shipped fast, and that's saying something in Canada ;) Thank you!
Thanks for these dice. Now I have to convince my friends to use them ha ha
I received my dice in Michigan (USA) a while ago and they are amazing! Thank you!
An update if they have been sent or not would be great. but sounds like you finished sending them all a few weeks ago.
I enjoy the dice and was surprised how quickly they arrived. I will have to keep an eye out for anything else you campaign for!
Continued Success Warriors!
The dices arrived. Thanks a lot especialy for sending it later.
My dice have arrived 2 days ago here in Italy, merci beaucoup!!!!
My dice have arrived in South Australia, they look good.
Mine finally arrived. I love them! Thank you!
Just arrived. Very happy :)
Got t mine today in Texas as well.
Got Mine today in Texas.
Received in Colorado (USA)
Received mine today. Thank you so much!!
Mine arrived today! Nice!
I have yet to see mine. I was hoping for a traceable number, but, alas, it is not to be. I hope they show up soon.
Well done!
Got mine today. I completely forgot they were sent. Great dice. Great job on the KS project!!!!
My dice arrived today. I'm really pleased with them, nicely done!
Bien reçu mon paquet également, super boulot et bravo !
Mine arrived just now. Really great quality. I like their weight and fine quality print of the symbols. Many thanks!
A friend of mine asked whether there's a way to order some if she missed the campaign. Do you plan to offer any later?
J'ai bien reçu ma paire de des j'en suis très satisfait ravi d'avoir travaillé avec vous et d'avoir financer votre projet
Hi sorry backer kit question placed in error hat bit was ment for another project, these dice are awesome and I thank you for the quick posting to me :)
Mine arrived today delighted with them thank you so much, just wondering if the extras bought through backer kit will be shipped later on? Hope you had a good Christmas and have a happy new year :)
Just received mine. They are really nice, many thanks!
Very nice dices!!
Reçu aujourd'hui, 2 super dés, un super projet, sérieux et rapide. :-)
Are there traceable numbers on the shipments?
Just recieved mine! Thanks
@severin thanks for telling me. I had no idea
@Dandilyn They have to wait around two weeks before Kickstarter sends them the money. I don't think there'll be news until then.
So any new updates?
@Jb : il y avait qu'à demander. :D
Va t on recevoir un moyen d’indiquer l’adresse de livraison ?
Bravo pour cette campagne réussie. J'ai hâte de recevoir mon dé pour remplacer ma table de localisation...
Ah, ok, until today I thought that Kickstarter is to START NEW products and not to sell OLD STOCK? Or did I miss something?
Winfried

I currently am pledged for two sets of dice but have found out the second set is no longer needed. But when I went to change my pledge, the one pair pledge was no longer available. Is there some way I can reduce my pledge please?
Merci pour ta réponse, et oui désolé j avais lu un peu travers pour les dés elementaires,j avais compris que c etait une ancienne campagne.
Merci
Dommage qu il n y ai pas d option pour egalement acheter les dés elementaires!
pour le stretch goal peut etre prevoir une coloration sur les dées ? ou mettre le dragon en or ?
How soon will this be ready after the pledge time?
bonsoir y auras t'il des plafonds a débloquer pour bénéficier d'un bonus ?

Just chiming in with the others to say that I would also be interested in packs of multiple human hit location die without the drakes. I know you've already stated that it's not possible for some reason, but if there are add-ons for humie dice at the end of the campaign, I'd be all about it.

@Corey - after the campaign ends, there will usually be a pledge manager that opens up. There are a small number of different managers, including one through KS itself. The project creators select which one makes the most sense for their project. I'm not sure which Elisabeth & Julien have selected. That pledge manager is where you will always confirm your address. If there are add-ons available for the campaign, that's also where you can select what you'd like.

Curious - is the estimated delivery date correct (all of the pledges say Dec, 2017)? The campaign ends Dec 12. It seems ambitious to get through the pledge manager, packaging and delivery in less than 3 weeks. If that date isn't correct, it may be worth an Update to let everyone know. Expectation management is key to happy customers, right?
At what point and how do we give you our shipping address? Sorry for the dumb question but this is the first thing I’ve funded on Kickstarter.
Can we pledge for one set of 2 dice and select if we want drake+human or human+human or drake+drake at the end of the campaign? (if there is enough human or drake dice)
Is it possible to get a 5 pair pledge and add another pair? I have 5 kids, all of whom game. I need a pair of course, and that makes 6....
